Package core

Class Canvas

java.lang.Object
core.Canvas
public class Canvas
extends java.lang.Object
Canvas class for the graphics designer which handles almost all graphical and logical functions.
Version:
1
Author:
rollonit, Klemens Fliri

  • Constructor Details

    • Canvas

      public Canvas​(PApplet pApplet, int x, int y, int h, int w)
      Default constructor for the canvas class.
      Parameters:
      pApplet - The main pApplet handle.
      x - The X coordinate of the top-left corner of the canvas.
      y - The Y coordinate of the top-left corner of the canvas.
      h - Height of the canvas.
      w - Width of the canvas.

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init()
      Initializer for the Canvas class.

    • draw

      public void draw()
      Draw call for the canvas. Call this every frame.

    • save

      public void save()
      Save the edits to the values in the text boxes and color selectors.

    • remove

      public void remove()
      Removes the currently selected shape from the current layer. Does nothing if no shape is selected.

    • addLayer

      public void addLayer()
      Adds a new layer to the canvas.

    • addLayer

      public void addLayer​(java.lang.String name, boolean visibility)
      Custom add methods to add shapes directly, parametrically.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the layer, can be anything.
      visibility - Is the layer is visible or not.

    • removeSelectedLayer

      public void removeSelectedLayer()
      Removes the currently selected layer from the canvas.

    • removeLayer

      public void removeLayer​(int index)
      Removes a specific layer from the canvas.
      Parameters:
      index -

    • beginShape

      public void beginShape()
      Starts the creation process for a shape, storing the beginning point of the shape. Doesn't actually add a shape to the canvas yet! Call endshape() to finish the creation process.

    • endShape

      public void endShape()
      Finishes the shape creation process and adds a shape to the current layer in the canvas. beginShape() must be called before this.

    • beginDrag

      public void beginDrag()
      Begins the shape dragging process. Sets a flag on the shape so it's not drawn while the temporary shape is being drawn. Call endDrag() to finish the moving process.

    • endDrag

      public void endDrag()
      Ends the dragging process and actually performs the move operarion. Call beginDrag() before this!

    • loadFile

      public void loadFile()
      Performs some checks to make sure that the file actually has data and loads the data from the current file.

    • saveFile

      public void saveFile()
      Saves the data to the current file.

    • add

      public void add​(int beginX, int beginY, int endX, int endY)
      Add a shape to the currently selected layer.
      Parameters:
      beginX - X-axis of corner 1.
      beginY - Y-axis of corner 1.
      endX - X-axis of corner 2.
      endY - Y-axis of corner 2.

    • deMoveAllShapes

      private void deMoveAllShapes()
      A function that sets all the shapes in the project to not being dragged at the current time. It's kind of a janky solution, but it works.

    • constrainToCanvasX

      private int constrainToCanvasX​(int toConstrain)
      Constrains a value to the X bounds of the canvas.
      Parameters:
      toConstrain - Value to constrain.
      Returns:
      The constrained value.

    • constrainToCanvasY

      private int constrainToCanvasY​(int toConstrain)
      Constrains a value to the Y bounds of the canvas.
      Parameters:
      toConstrain - Value to constrain.
      Returns:
      The constrained value.

    • addToLayer

      public void addToLayer​(int layerToAdd, ShapeType type, java.lang.String name, int x, int y, int w, int h, int stroke, int color)
      Adds a shape parametrically directly to a specific layer, to be used with DB operations.
      Parameters:
      layerToAdd - Layer index to add the shape to.
      type - Type of shape to be added (Square, Triangle or Ellipse).
      name - Name of the shape.
      x - X- coordinate of the shape.
      y - Y- coordinate of the shape.
      w - Width of the shape.
      h - Height of the shape.
      stroke - The stroke color of the shape.
      color - Color of the shape.

    • moveLayer

      public int moveLayer​(int layerToMove, int whereToMove)
      Moves a given layer in the canvas to a given position.
      Parameters:
      layerToMove - The index of the layer to be moved.
      whereToMove - the index to which the layer is to be moved.
      Returns:
      1 if the move operation is succesful, 0 otherwise

    • deleteAllLayers

      public void deleteAllLayers()
      Deletes all the layers in the current canvas. Use with care!

    • select

      public void select()
      Performs the select operation at the current mouse position.

    • updateFields

      public void updateFields()
      Updates all the text fields to the current values from the current shape. It also offsets the X and Y to account for the canvas position.

    • isInCanvas

      private boolean isInCanvas​(int x, int y)
      Checks if the given X and Y coordinates are within the canvas.
      Parameters:
      X - X-axis of the point to check.
      Y - Y-axis of the point to check.
      Returns:
      True if the given point is within canvas.

    • isInCanvas

      private boolean isInCanvas​(int x, int y, int h, int w)
      Checks if a shape with the given properties is within the canvas.
      Parameters:
      x - X-axis of the corner of the shape.
      y - Y-axis of the corner of the shape.
      h - Height of the shape.
      w - Width of the shape.
      Returns:
      True if the given shape is within the canvas.

    • getCurrentLayer

      private Layer getCurrentLayer()
      Returns:
      The currently selected object as a Layer object.

    • getCurrentShape

      private Shape getCurrentShape()
      Returns:
      The currently selected shape as a Shape object.

    • getLayers

      public java.util.ArrayList<Layer> getLayers()
      Returns:
      All the layers in the canvas in an ArrayList.

    • getLayer

      public Layer getLayer​(int index)
      Gets a specific layer, if the layer actually exists.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the layer to get.
      Returns:
      The layer at that index as a Layer object.

    • getBackgroundColor

      public int getBackgroundColor()
      Returns:
      The current background color as an int.

    • setBackgroundColor

      public void setBackgroundColor​(int theColor)
      Parameters:
      theColor - The color to set the background to.
